Package com.lukflug.panelstudio

Interface Component

All Known Subinterfaces:
FixedComponent, TabGUIComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
BooleanComponent, CollapsibleContainer, ColorComponent, ColorComponent.ColorButton, ColorComponent.ColorSlider, Container, DraggableContainer, EnumComponent, FocusableComponent, HUDComponent, HUDPanel, KeybindComponent, ListComponent, NumberComponent, Slider, TabGUI, TabGUIContainer, TabGUIItem, ToggleableContainer
public interface Component
Interface representing a drawable object in the GUI.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void exit​(Context context)
    Should be called by the parent when the GUI is closed.
    void getHeight​(Context context)
    Get the current height via Context.setHeight(int).
    java.lang.String getTitle()
    Get the caption of the component.
    void handleButton​(Context context, int button)
    Should be called by the parent when a mouse button state changes.
    void handleKey​(Context context, int scancode)
    Should be called by the parent when a key is typed.
    void handleScroll​(Context context, int diff)
    Should be called by the parent when the mouse wheel is scrolled.
    void releaseFocus()
    Called when a parent loses focus.
    void render​(Context context)
    Redraw component on screen.

  • Method Details

    • getTitle

      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Get the caption of the component. String may also be empty.
      Returns:
      the caption of the component

    • render

      void render​(Context context)
      Redraw component on screen. The current height of the component should be set by this method via Context.setHeight(int).
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component

    • handleButton

      void handleButton​(Context context, int button)
      Should be called by the parent when a mouse button state changes. The current height of the component should be set by this method via Context.setHeight(int).
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      button - the button that changed its state
      See Also:
      Interface.LBUTTON, Interface.RBUTTON

    • handleKey

      void handleKey​(Context context, int scancode)
      Should be called by the parent when a key is typed. The current height of the component should be set by this method via Context.setHeight(int).
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      scancode - the scancode for the key that was typed

    • handleScroll

      void handleScroll​(Context context, int diff)
      Should be called by the parent when the mouse wheel is scrolled. The current height of the component should be set by this method via Context.setHeight(int).
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      diff - the amount by which the wheel was moved

    • getHeight

      void getHeight​(Context context)
      Get the current height via Context.setHeight(int).
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component

    • exit

      void exit​(Context context)
      Should be called by the parent when the GUI is closed. The current height of the component should be set by this method via Context.setHeight(int).
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component

    • releaseFocus

      void releaseFocus()
      Called when a parent loses focus.
